name: Notejumper
description:
Learning piano notes never has been more fun. Geeky jumps if you tap the right key. Play it in the right moment to hit the notes for even more points. But attention, their flow is getting faster. Crack the highscore and become the jumping notemaster.

______________________

The game offers these awesome features:

# the whole jump’n run experience with increasing speed and saving of your personal highscore
# two different modes: G clef mode & bass clef mode
# real piano sounds
​# useful settings
# adjust the speed
# switch to training mode and learn from your mistakes in the active game
# switch off piano names and sounds
